mkv77:2: katame daśa guṇāḥ pravrajyāyāḥ. ucyate. putrabhāryaduhitṛdhanatṛṣṇāsya na bhavati. kāmasya parigraho na bhavati. araṇyavāse prītiṁ pratilabhate. buddhagocaraṁ sevate. bālagocaraṁ vivarjayati. durgatigamanīyān dharmān vivarjayati. sugatigamanīyān dharmān sevate. devā asya spṛhayanti. nityaṁ sugatavacane pravrajyāṁ pratilabhate. ime daśa guṇāḥ pravrajyāyā bhavanti.
